== Ubuntu Wisconsin LoCo Team Meet and Greet Meeting Agenda ==

{{https://wiki.ubuntu.com/WisconsinTeam?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=wi-seal.jpg}}

=== Meeting Details ===

'''Facilitator:''' Simon Quigley aka <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/tsimonq2|tsimonq2]]</nowiki>

'''Location:''' <nowiki>[[https://plus.google.com/hangouts/_/wralee4eof3epljuplcmg3mw34a|Hangouts]]</nowiki>, irc.freenode.net / <nowiki>[[irc:--irc.freenode.net-ubuntu-us-wi|#ubuntu-us-wi]]</nowiki>

'''Meeting Log:''' <nowiki>[[http://ubottu.com/meetingology/logs/ubuntu-us-wi/2015/ubuntu-us-wi.2015-11-04-01.05.moin.txt]]</nowiki>

=== Agenda ===
==== Introduce each other, go over agenda ====
* What is the purpose of Ubuntu in '''your''' daily life?
* Do you contribute and if so, what do you do?
==== Ubuntu 15.10 was released! ====
* New features
** <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/WilyWerewolf/ReleaseNotes|Ubuntu]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/WilyWerewolf/ReleaseNotes/Lubuntu|Lubuntu]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[https://kubuntu.org/news/kubuntu-15-10/|Kubuntu]]</nowiki>
** Any other flavors that anybody thinks we should cover? If so, please link the release notes in IRC
* Opinions?
** What are some opinions on the codename? (Wily Werewolf)
** Is there anything major that jumps out at you when you are looking at this new release?
==== Ubuntu 16.04 LTS is going with the codename Xenial Xerus ====
* <nowiki>[[http://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/xenial|Xenial]]</nowiki> is, "Of, relating to, or constituting hospitality or relations between host and guest and especially among the ancient Greeks between persons of different cities"
* <nowiki>[[http://animaldiversity.org/accounts/Xerus_inauris/|Xerus]]</nowiki> is also known as the African Ground Squirrel
* <nowiki>[[http://www.markshuttleworth.com/archives/1479|Xenial Xerus!]]</nowiki>
* Opinions?
** Xenail!
** At least it is not a mythical creature this time! (look to Wily and Utopic)
==== Team Renewal ====
* Should we renew this team? Why or why not?
** Review <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/LoCoTeamHowto|this document]]</nowiki>
* Positions
** Should the leader be the contact?
** How will team leadership be handled?
** Team Reports "Specialist"
** Should we go to the mailing list to discuss this?
==== Logo ====
* What is the progress on that?
* Let's pick a date for it to be done if it isn't already
* Voting?
** This assumes we have more than one
==== Monthly Meetings? ====
* What non-conflicting time each month would work the best?
* Milestone meetings?
** Beta 1
** Beta 2
** etc.
* If we do have monthly meetings, should Simon be all-time facilitator, should we have someone else have that role, or should we rotate?
==== Conclusion ====
* Where could we find each other this next month?
* <nowiki>[[https://calendar.google.com/calendar/embed?src=ccvfp9csoal0hvl0eok1marhds@group.calendar.google.com&pli=1|Calendar for LUG events]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://plus.google.com/events/cena058k6tfatl0gppbsqfs72s4|Monthly Pan-Wisconsin Linux User Meeting Hangout]]</nowiki>
